languages.text:
Depending on the familiar's Wounds level, the Overseer or the familiar itself receives a bonus for 1 round:
Less than 50% Wounds: the next 3 hits targeting the familiar have their damage reduced by {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.
50% Wounds and more: The Overseer has {uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage to their next attacking ability. If this ability kills an enemy, it doesn't count towards the attack limit, and the Overseer restores AP spent on it.

traits.locale_text:
Depending on the familiar's Wounds level, the Overseer or the familiar itself receives a bonus for 1 round:
Less than 50% Wounds: the next 3 hits targeting the familiar have their damage reduced by {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.
50% Wounds and more: The Overseer has {uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage to their next attacking ability. If this ability kills an enemy, it doesn't count towards the attack limit, and the Overseer restores AP spent on it.

languages.text:
Depending on their familiar's number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or the familiar gains a special benefit for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Less than 50% wounds: the next 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} against the familiar have their damage reduced by −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% wounds or more: the Overseer deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.</indent>
languages.original_text:
В зависимости от запаса {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} фамильяра его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} получает особое преимущество на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Меньше 50% здоровья: следующие 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} по фамильяру наносят на {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} меньше урона.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% здоровья или больше: надзиратель наносит на {uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% больше урона следующей атакой. Если эта атака убивает цель, она не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}, а надзиратель восстанавливает потраченные на нее {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
В зависимости от запаса здоровья фамильяра его надзиратель получает особое преимущество на 1 раунд:
-<indent=5%>Меньше 50% здоровья: следующие 3 попадания по фамильяру наносят на {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} меньше урона.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% здоровья или больше: надзиратель наносит на {uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% больше урона следующей атакой. Если эта атака убивает цель, она не входит в лимит атак на ход, а надзиратель восстанавливает потраченные на нее ОД.</indent>

В зависимости от запаса здоровья фамильяра его надзиратель получает особое преимущество на 1 раунд:
-<indent=5%>Меньше 50% здоровья: следующие 3 попадания по фамильяру наносят на {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} меньше урона.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% здоровья или больше: надзиратель наносит на {uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% больше урона следующей атакой. Если эта атака убивает цель, она не входит в лимит атак на ход, а надзиратель восстанавливает потраченные на нее ОД.</indent>

languages.text:
Abhängig von der Zahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} seines Vertrauten, erhalten der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} oder sein Vertrauter 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang einen speziellen Vorteil:
-<indent=5%>Weniger als 50 % Wunden: Die nächsten 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} gegen den Vertrauten verursachen -{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} Schaden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50 % oder mehr Wunden: Der Aufseher verursacht mit seinem nächsten Angriff +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % mehr Schaden. Tötet der Angriff das Ziel, fließt er nicht in das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} ein und der Aufseher erhält die eingesetzten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Depending on their familiar's number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or the familiar gains a special benefit for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Less than 50% wounds: the next 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} against the familiar have their damage reduced by −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% wounds or more: the Overseer deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Abhängig von der Zahl der Wunden seines Vertrauten, erhalten der Aufseher oder sein Vertrauter 1 Runde lang einen speziellen Vorteil:
-<indent=5%>Weniger als 50 % Wunden: Die nächsten 3 Treffer gegen den Vertrauten verursachen -{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} Schaden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50 % oder mehr Wunden: Der Aufseher verursacht mit seinem nächsten Angriff +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % mehr Schaden. Tötet der Angriff das Ziel, fließt er nicht in das Angriffslimit pro Zug ein und der Aufseher erhält die eingesetzten AP zurück.</indent>

Depending on their familiar's number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or the familiar gains a special benefit for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Less than 50% wounds: the next 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} against the familiar have their damage reduced by −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% wounds or more: the Overseer deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Le surveillant ou son familier gagnent un avantage spécial pendant 1 round, en fonction du nombre de blessures du familier :
-<indent=5%>Blessures inférieures à 50 % : les dégâts des 3 prochaines attaques touchant le familier sont réduits de −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Blessures supérieures ou égales à 50 % : la prochaine attaque du surveillant inflige +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % de dégâts. Si elle tue la cible, elle n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour et le surveillant récupère les PA dépensés pour l'effectuer.</indent>

languages.text:
根据使仆的剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}或使仆会获得特殊增益效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}：
- <indent=5%>若使仆生命值低于50%：使仆接下来承受的3次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻击{/g}，受到的伤害降低{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>若使仆生命值不低于50%：监察官下次攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%。如果此次攻击击杀了目标，则此次攻击不会计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合的攻击上限{/g}，同时返还监察官此次攻击耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Depending on their familiar's number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or the familiar gains a special benefit for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Less than 50% wounds: the next 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} against the familiar have their damage reduced by −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% wounds or more: the Overseer deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
根据使仆的剩余生命值，监察官或使仆会获得特殊增益效果，持续一轮：
- <indent=5%>若使仆生命值低于50%：使仆接下来承受的3次攻击，受到的伤害降低{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>若使仆生命值不低于50%：监察官下次攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%。如果此次攻击击杀了目标，则此次攻击不会计入每回合的攻击上限，同时返还监察官此次攻击耗费的行动点数。</indent>

languages.text:
Dependiendo de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de su familiar, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} o su familiar obtienen una ventaja especial durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Menos del 50 % de heridas: los siguientes 3 impactos contra el familiar {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}infligen{/g} −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} de daño.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50 % de heridas o más: el siguiente ataque del supervisor inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % más de daño. Si el ataque mata al enemigo, no cuenta para el límite de {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataques por turno{/g} y el supervisor recupera los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} invertidos.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Depending on their familiar's number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or the familiar gains a special benefit for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Less than 50% wounds: the next 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} against the familiar have their damage reduced by −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% wounds or more: the Overseer deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Dependiendo de las heridas de su familiar, el supervisor o su familiar obtienen una ventaja especial durante 1 asalto:
-<indent=5%>Menos del 50 % de heridas: los siguientes 3 impactos contra el familiar infligen −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} de daño.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50 % de heridas o más: el siguiente ataque del supervisor inflige un +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} % más de daño. Si el ataque mata al enemigo, no cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno y el supervisor recupera los PA invertidos.</indent>

languages.text:
ファミリアーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}によって、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}またはそのファミリアーは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、以下のような特殊な効果を付与される。
-<indent=5%>傷が50%より低い場合：次の3回の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}によってファミリアーが受けるダメージが−{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}低下する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が50%以上の場合：監督官は、その次の攻撃で+{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%の追加ダメージを与える。この攻撃で、ターゲットが倒された場合、ターンごとの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}にカウントされず、監督官は消費した{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を回復する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Depending on their familiar's number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or the familiar gains a special benefit for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Less than 50% wounds: the next 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} against the familiar have their damage reduced by −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% wounds or more: the Overseer deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
ファミリアーの傷によって、監督官またはそのファミリアーは1ラウンドの間、以下のような特殊な効果を付与される。
-<indent=5%>傷が50%より低い場合：次の3回の攻撃によってファミリアーが受けるダメージが−{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}低下する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>傷が50%以上の場合：監督官は、その次の攻撃で+{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}%の追加ダメージを与える。この攻撃で、ターゲットが倒された場合、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされず、監督官は消費したAPを回復する。</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} veya iyesi, iyenin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanına bağlı olarak 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} özel bir fayda kazanır:
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %50'nin altındaysa: İyeye yapılan sonraki 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşun{/g} vereceği hasar {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} azalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %50 veya üstündeyse: Gözetmen, bir sonraki saldırısıyla +%{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} daha fazla hasar verir. Bu saldırı, hedefi öldürürse {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ve Gözetmen, saldırıda harcadığı {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'yi geri kazanır.</indent>

Depending on their familiar's number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} or the familiar gains a special benefit for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Less than 50% wounds: the next 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} against the familiar have their damage reduced by −{uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>50% wounds or more: the Overseer deals +{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}% more damage with their next attack. If that attack kills the target, it does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}, and the Overseer regains any {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent on it.</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} veya iyesi, iyenin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanına bağlı olarak 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} özel bir fayda kazanır:
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %50'nin altındaysa: İyeye yapılan sonraki 3 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşun{/g} vereceği hasar {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} azalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %50 veya üstündeyse: Gözetmen, bir sonraki saldırısıyla +%{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} daha fazla hasar verir. Bu saldırı, hedefi öldürürse {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ve Gözetmen, saldırıda harcadığı {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP'yi{/g} geri kazanır.</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/G} veya iyesi, iyenin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanına{/g} bağlı olarak 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} özel bir fayda kazanır:
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %50'nin altındaysa: İyeye yapılan sonraki 3 vuruşun vereceği hasar {uip|Reduce|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} azalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Sağlık puanı %50 veya üstündeyse: Gözetmen, bir sonraki saldırısıyla +%{uip|DamageBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} daha fazla hasar verir. Bu saldırı, hedefi öldürürse tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz ve Gözetmen, saldırıda harcadığı EP'yi geri kazanır.</indent>
